amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to conduct a survey in which money is included or provided for the benefit of the responder.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to conduct a survey in which money is included or provided for the benefit of the responder.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 51 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 355 - 51 (Roll no. 322).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Tipton.
